page.title: 15TOURISM IN MORFA BYCHAN
page.content: This area is extremely popular with holiday makers.Its main attraction is the beach,over 2 miles of smooth firm sand safe for children and for bathing.Cars can be driven on it from either of 2 concrete-built access points.Sailing and a variety of water sports including wind-surfing,canoeing and water skiing are popular.The variety of foot-paths encourages walking and views from the slopes of Moel y Gest are spectacular.The area is within easy travelling distance of many places of historic interest and great natural beauty,including the Snowdonia National Park.There are no hotels or boarding houses,but ample bed & breakfast accomodation,though most visitors stay in caravans,rented houses and in tents on camp-sites.
